notes: In this lab bundle, signatures may be placeholders if minisign is not available in CI. Replace with real minisign signatures in production.

verification.rule: An object is quorum-valid if at least m of n signatures verify against the corresponding pubkeys in quorum.json.
verification.signature_paths: For object X, signatures are stored as /.well-known/policy/sigs/<basename(X)>.json.minisig OR per-kid signatures in future v1.5.
